text: Frazer Hines (born 22 September 1944) is an English actor. He is best known for his roles as Jamie McCrimmon in Doctor Who and Joe Sugden in Emmerdale. Hines appeared in 117 episodes of the original series of Doctor Who; only the first four Doctors appeared in more episodes. He was born in Horsforth, West Riding of Yorkshire. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English voice actors Category:English stage actors Category:Actors from Yorkshire
title: Frazer Hines
